title: Build interactive demo: user-configurable service generator with live dashboard
description:
**Approach: Pre-Generated Service Gallery (Zero-Cost)**

Build GitHub Pages demo showcasing NthLayer's capabilities through curated examples.

**Service Gallery (5-8 pre-generated):**
- payment-api (PostgreSQL, Redis, Kubernetes)
- checkout-service (MySQL, RabbitMQ, ECS)
- notification-worker (Redis, Kafka, Kubernetes)
- analytics-stream (MongoDB, Kafka, Kubernetes)
- user-service (PostgreSQL, Redis, ECS)
- recommendation-engine (Redis, Kafka, Kubernetes)

**Each service includes:**
- Live Grafana dashboard (embedded, public URL)
- Mock metrics flowing (shows real data)
- Service YAML displayed (read-only, for reference)
- Auto-generated: 3 SLOs, 12-40 alerts, recording rules
- Technology-specific panels (PostgreSQL, Kubernetes, etc)

**User Experience:**
1. Land on demo page
2. Browse service gallery (cards with icons)
3. Click service → view live dashboard + service YAML
4. 'Random Service' button for instant demo
5. Clear CTA: 'Install NthLayer to generate this for your services'

**NO Downloads:**
- Users cannot download JSON/configs
- Demo shows capabilities only
- Must install NthLayer to generate artifacts

**Value Prop:** 
'See NthLayer's technology intelligence in action - detecting dependencies and auto-generating production-ready observability'

**Technical:**
- Extend current Fly.io app with 4-7 additional mock services
- Each service has unique mock metrics
- All dashboards pre-pushed to Grafana Cloud (public)
- GitHub Pages with clean gallery UI

**Zero-Cost:**
- Fly.io free tier sufficient (256MB RAM per service)
- 8 dashboards well within Grafana Cloud free tier
- GitHub Pages free

**Time estimate:** 1-2 hours

comments.author: robfox
comments.text: Refined approach: Pre-generated gallery instead of user-generated configs. No downloadable artifacts - users must install NthLayer. This is a capabilities demo, not a free service.
